title: Product Description
original_prompt: From now you will act as an expert in writing product descriptions. Write a description for an e-commerce store. The product is "Caffeine Gummies." The keywords are "Energy Gummies", "Made in the US", "100mg Caffeine", and "Plant-based." Be creative and Fresh but also be concise and to the point. Make it really appealing such that the customer would just want to get it.
split_prompt:
This is a prompt description:```json
{
    "spliting prompt": {
        "product_type": [
            "Caffeine Gummies",
            "Energy Gummies"
        ],
        "features": [
            "100mg Caffeine",
            "Plant-based",
            "Made in the US"
        ],
        "tone": [
            "creative",
            "fresh",
            "concise",
            "appealing"
        ],
        "target_audience": [
            "health-conscious consumers",
            "busy professionals",
            "students"
        ],
        "call_to_action": [
            "Get energized today!",
            "Boost your day with a delicious gummy!",
            "Experience the power of plant-based energy!"
        ]
    }
}
```
input1: Experience a burst of energy with our Caffeine Gummies! Each gummy is packed with 100mg of caffeine, providing you with the perfect pick-me-up to power through your day. Made in the US with high-quality, plant-based ingredients, these Energy Gummies are not only delicious but also a guilt-free way to stay energized. Whether you're hitting the gym, tackling a busy workday, or just need a boost, our Caffeine Gummies are your go-to solution for sustained energy without the crash. Grab yours today and elevate your energy levels naturally!
input2: Unleash your potential with our Caffeine Gummies, the ultimate energy booster for your active lifestyle! Each gummy delivers a potent 100mg of caffeine, crafted from plant-based ingredients right here in the US. Perfect for those on the go, these Energy Gummies are a tasty and convenient way to stay alert and focused. Say goodbye to sluggish afternoons and hello to vibrant energy that lasts. Treat yourself to a delicious way to fuel your day—order your Caffeine Gummies now and feel the difference!
